H0.text: The religious order of Poor Ladies of San Damiano has what more common name. Clarissans

H1.text: The religious order of Poor Ladies of San Damiano has what more common name. Damianites

H2.text: The religious order of Poor Ladies of San Damiano has what more common name. Assisians

H3.text: The religious order of Poor Ladies of San Damiano has what more common name. Minoress

A4.text: The Poor Clares are also known as the Clarisses.

A5.text: The Poor Clares are also known as the Minoresses.

A6.text: Following her death, the order she founded was renamed in her honor as the Order of Saint Clare, commonly referred to today as the Poor Clares.

A7.text: The order is commonly referred to today as the Poor Clares.

A8.text: The Poor Clares of the Monastery of Saint Clare.
